title: Sportsbetio Problems
author: Sportsbetio Problems
content: Ok I'm tired of issues with Sportsbet.io- Big issue regarding verification and they locked me out a couple of months ago with a good balance in my account, then they unblocked after few days- Then again they blocked later- Now one big issue thats been running Since July and Sportsbet team is loving and enjoying to waste my time and I cannot take it anymoreTime since the issue is running - 4 MonthsI am out of patience, I'm not waiting 1 more dayIssue details :-A bet was incorrectly scoredBet ID # 62ded91dbce765d1e4afdaffAmount = $1,250 bet amount + 4.07 Odds Potential Profit so actual amount is $5,000+Bet was won, but they changed scores and made it a lossI had the proofs of it win on Sportsbet.io which I emailed them several timesBut since it was a Virtual sport therefore there's no verification on the internet of itSo they cannot prove their own change of results, so I had to contact Curacao Gaming License Authorities to check this matterNow it's been 4 months, Curaco is not helping, they said they will help in this case, they took every single info and proofs from me nd sportsbet.io 3 months ago, and they said they're making the verdict After 3 months they replied nd guess what their verdict was ? "Give us more info" thats their reply to sportsbet.ioThey reply 1 time every 3 months onlyAnd with this speed I can expect my result in 10 yearsSo I'm done, 4 months was enough time- Do I think Sportsbet.io is scam? Not sure, because last month I played 2-3 million dollars (Yes Steve, check my September + October history) and they've always paidBut this matter is making me nuts, Its freaking me outEven if it was a matter of 1$ I would still be upsetI am one of the biggest clients of them, and they treat me like TRASH, like some pathetic beggar of the streetI cannot take that disrespectI need this matter resolved right nowUntil that timeSPORTSBET.IO SCAM, Don't DEPOSIT FUNDS because they can SCAM YOU and STOP REPLYING ABOUT IT

comments.author: Sportsbetio Problems
comments.body: Quote from: Chahan on October 28, 2022, 09:59:37 AMIf you have proof you should show those in here, and also follow the scam accusation guidelines.Then people can understand your situation and maybe help.CheersThe Sportsbet team guy is here and he can verify matter through bet ID which I postedAlready he acknowledged it in the other topic

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Sportsbetio Problems on October 28, 2022, 08:00:13 AMAfter 3 months they replied nd guess what their verdict was ? "Give us more info" thats their reply to sportsbet.ioThey reply 1 time every 3 months onlyif you contacted them and stated the problem in the way you did here, I almost understand why you don't get answers. And guess what we will tell you here? Give us more info about what is happened. Some proof, or anything?Quote- Do I think Sportsbet.io is scam? Not sure, because last month I played 2-3 million dollars (Yes Steve, check my September + October history) and they've always paidCan you prove this with some unedited screenshots?

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: Sportsbetio Problems on October 28, 2022, 08:00:13 AM- Do I think Sportsbet.io is scam? Not sure, because last month I played 2-3 million dollars (Yes Steve, check my September + October history) and they've always paid.....SPORTSBET.IO SCAM, Don't DEPOSIT FUNDS because they can SCAM YOU and STOP REPLYING ABOUT ITWhich is which?What is the point of this accusation then if your statements are contradictory?You also had some issue with them back then and it was still resolved -  Sportsbet.io (Resolved)Quote from: Sportsbetio Problems on October 28, 2022, 10:05:31 AMThe Sportsbet team guy is here and he can verify matter through bet ID which I postedAlready he acknowledged it in the other topicMeaning, you don't need opinions from the third party?

comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: Quote from: Sportsbetio Problems on October 28, 2022, 08:00:13 AMNow it's been 4 months, Curaco is not helping, they said they will help in this case, they took every single info and proofs from me nd sportsbet.io 3 months ago, and they said they're making the verdict After 3 months they replied nd guess what their verdict was ? "Give us more info" thats their reply to sportsbet.ioThey reply 1 time every 3 months onlyAnd with this speed I can expect my result in 10 years With the way you present the matter, it would almost certainly take more than 20 years to get the answer you require. Customers service are humans, not bots, and if they ask for more information, it means that what you provided wasn't sufficient, just like what you did here, a wall of text with no proof.Is it possible for sportbet to manipulate virtual game scores? I don't think it's possible because they're only acting as a host for the game provider. I'm a big fan of sportbet virtual horse race and I've never had any problems with it over the years.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: Sportsbetio Problems on October 28, 2022, 10:05:31 AMThe Sportsbet team guy is here and he can verify matter through bet ID which I postedAlready he acknowledged it in the other topicWithout any kind of evidence this thread will be considered baseless. If you have been scammed by them then you must have those proofs, give those proofs here only then it will be convenient for everyone to understand whether your complaint is true or not. If they disrespected you, then you had a lot of conversations with them. Still waiting to see what their representative gives you the exact answer. And what is your reaction after that.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: I will refer an answer from sportsbet.io's representative e.g. Steve, actually they're already respond your accusation in their thread, so I will put here to let now for anyone who still don't know about this.You're just a mad gambler who always complain to the casino when you're loss, IMO you must have a communication with sportsbet.io first rather than make a complain like this one. In some casino there's a rule where they're forbid you to talk false about their casino and they can block your account.Quote from: sportsbet.io on October 28, 2022, 09:36:01 AMHi J,(I can refer to you as J as we have had this same conversation previously on bitcointalk)As you are aware, our (Sportsbet.io) communication with you on this matter was closed 3 months ago. We were more than 100% happy that everything was settled correctly with the physical and technical evidence we have on hand.You then raised a complaint with "Curaçao eGaming ("CEG")" so your time frustrations need to be aired with them.They have asked us for more information regarding the matter previously and we have complied with their requests in a timely manner.If for some reason they wish to ask us for more high-level technical information to back up our initial reply to them, we will promptly do so for sure upon that request.Confirming that the time issue you believe is of major concern is in fact with "Curaçao eGaming ("CEG")" and not sportsbet.io. Please follow up with them.On the second matter, your statement about "do not deposit funds with them, they will scam you" I have to take you up on that comment as I believe your views are quite contradictory.In the previous 6 days, you have deposited in DOGE, ETH, TRX, USDT, LTC and BTC... quite a vast array of deposit methods.You also played a great amount on Sports and Casino and we thank you for your custom on those products.As always, we paid out in a prompt manner to your wallet each time you requested a withdrawal. I also see you had some winners whilst using our in-play 'cash out' so we are glad to hear you are using all of our features onsite.It would be appreciated if you could take down the statement "I am tired of issues with sportsbet.io" because we are not aware of any that you have had this week.. many thanksAs you can imagine, I don't have any more information to add to this matter.For now, I can assure you that if any request from "Curaçao eGaming ("CEG")" comes to our inbox, we will promptly act accordingly on their requests and decisions.regards,Steve.Sportsbet.io

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: So, this scam thread is basically an attempt to pressure the casino into paying a bet from 4 months ago? If you really feel they "scammed" you, then why do you still deposit there? If I was sportsbet I would close your account and send you on your way, but that's just me.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Sportsbetio Problems on October 28, 2022, 10:05:31 AMThe Sportsbet team guy is here and he can verify matter through bet ID which I postedAlready he acknowledged it in the other topicThe team of Sportsbet may identify the matter but no user of the forum except the team of Sportsbet can verify any reality of your accusation. And if they really scam you then they will not disclose the case. So to let the community know the reality you should post as much information as possible against Sportsbet.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: Quote from: Sportsbetio Problems on October 28, 2022, 08:00:13 AM- Do I think Sportsbet.io is scam? Not sure, because last month I played 2-3 million dollars (Yes Steve, check my September + October history) and they've always paidWhy open a scam accusation and title it "Sportsbet.io SCAMMED for $5000" if you are not sure they are a scam?Quote from: Sportsbetio Problems on October 28, 2022, 08:00:13 AMBut this matter is making me nuts, Its freaking me outEven if it was a matter of 1$ I would still be upsetI am highly sceptical about your claims and suspect you have ulterior motives here but you can always post screenshots of evidence to back your allegations.Quote from: Sportsbetio Problems on October 28, 2022, 08:00:13 AMI am one of the biggest clients of them, and they treat me like TRASH, like some pathetic beggar of the streetCan you prove you played millions of USD$ at their website by blockchain transactions showing which crypto you sent and on which dates and the  sign the sending wallet addresses?Do you have any screenshots to show evidence of your claim that you are owed $5000?I find your claims that you played between $2 million to $3 million highly suspect. Can you provide evidence of this?Quote from: yahoo62278 on October 30, 2022, 09:38:16 AMSo, this scam thread is basically an attempt to pressure the casino into paying a bet from 4 months ago? If you really feel they "scammed" you, then why do you still deposit there? If I was sportsbet I would close your account and send you on your way, but that's just me.It seems that way.Quote from: shasan on November 05, 2022, 07:38:40 PMQuote from: Sportsbetio Problems on October 28, 2022, 10:05:31 AMThe Sportsbet team guy is here and he can verify matter through bet ID which I postedAlready he acknowledged it in the other topicThe team of Sportsbet may identify the matter but no user of the forum except the team of Sportsbet can verify any reality of your accusation. And if they really scam you then they will not disclose the case. So to let the community know the reality you should post as much information as possible against Sportsbet.Is it really a coincidence the OP has not provided specific details to his claim? If someone is making a scam allegation surely they have to provide evidence without being prompted and the OP has failed to demonstrate in any capacity he is a victim of a scam.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: So, to sum up what you have said here:- Sportsbet.io scammed you for $5.000.- You are not sure if they are scammers because they regularly pay out your winnings.- You are definitely sure they are scammers, and shouldn't be trusted with any money.- Despite your claims of them scamming you, you have regularly played and withdrawn money from the casino.- You have wagered millions of dollars worth of crypto on a platform you accuse of scamming (even after the alleged incident happened).  - You would like to warn all players not to play on Sportsbet, while you continue playing and withdrawing from there.Did I get it all correctly?

comments.author: sportsbet.io
comments.body: Hi All,Please be advised that we have received a final response from Curacao eGaming.They have advised us that due to all the information provided by both parties, it would be fair and reasonable on this occasion to void the bet in question and return your staked amount.As previously stated by Sportsbet.io, we will respect the final decision upon the finding and for that reason, we have actioned the void of the bet. This has resulted in 1250 USDT  returning to your account.Thank you all for your patience. Along with Curacao eGaming, we consider this matter now closed.regards,Steve.sportsbet.io

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: sportsbet.io on November 17, 2022, 11:20:16 AMHi All,Please be advised that we have received a final response from Curacao eGaming.They have advised us that due to all the information provided by both parties, it would be fair and reasonable on this occasion to void the bet in question and return your staked amount.As previously stated by Sportsbet.io, we will respect the final decision upon the finding and for that reason, we have actioned the void of the bet. This has resulted in 1250 USDT  returning to your account.Thank you all for your patience. Along with Curacao eGaming, we consider this matter now closed.regards,Steve.sportsbet.ioAs the decision came from Curacao eGaming that the bet should be void and you have respectively followed the instruction and you have already returned the original bet amount I think OP should obey the decision and close the case. You(OP) should lock the thread if you(OP) think all have been settled.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on November 17, 2022, 01:45:21 PMYou(OP) should lock the thread if you(OP) think all have been settled.His last login date is on the 4th of the month which means he is not bothered to login and update or may be he does not have much time. But it's obvious if he does not receive the stake then he will write something.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: Thank you Steve for posting with an update as soon as you were able to.I read what the OP stated but I did not find a direct reply by Sportsbet or know if their side of the story was ever made public but they have returned 1250 USDT to the OP.All that is left to do is for the OP to lock the thread if he ever returns to the forum. He was last active on 4th November 2022.Quote from: sportsbet.io on November 17, 2022, 11:20:16 AMHi All,Please be advised that we have received a final response from Curacao eGaming.They have advised us that due to all the information provided by both parties, it would be fair and reasonable on this occasion to void the bet in question and return your staked amount.As previously stated by Sportsbet.io, we will respect the final decision upon the finding and for that reason, we have actioned the void of the bet. This has resulted in 1250 USDT  returning to your account.Thank you all for your patience. Along with Curacao eGaming, we consider this matter now closed.regards,Steve.sportsbet.io
